summary: This mod give you a lot of .txt files to give you/help you in your game.
descriptionHtml:
All the bat files are from me  and tested by me.

Put the files in your "Data" game, launch skyrim and open the console whith ².

Type :
bat incpcs      
To :
increase 100 in every perk, you will level up.

Type
bat heartfire    
To :
give you all you need to build your house in heartfire + food and child clothes.

Type :
bat follower
To :  
select a NPC before and he will be a follower for you if he have a compatible voice.

Type :
bat divorce
To :
select your wife before, and your marriage will be reset, trash your amulet, go buy another and enjoy !

Type :
bat enchant
To :
that will give you 1item per enchant, you just have to disenchant.

Type :
bat map
To :
all the markers will be discovered on the map.

Type
bat forge
To :
give you 30 of the most needed materials to craft (leathers, iron ingots, dragons scales, reffined moonstones, ...)

Type :
bat money
To :
that will give you 50 000 gold.

Type :
bat souls    
To :
that will give you 10 dragons souls

Type
bat daedric
To :
give you the complet daedric armor set and all the weapons whith 1000 arrows.

Type
bat spell
To :
You will learnt all spells and shouts, u will need dragons souls to unlock shout (you can use souls.txt) CAUTION : game can crash when u will open magick menu for first time.

Type
bat novamp
To :
cure your vampirism

Type
bat unlock
To :
select a door and type this, that will unlock the lockpick and key.

Type
bat race
To :
open the menu to choose your race, apparence, name, ... GAME CAN CRASH YOU HAVE MOD ON NEXUS TO COUNTER : race menu killer.

Sorry for my bad english i'm french and i dont want to use reverso or another.


Ask me if you want another give bat file or others.

If youn want to be generous, u just have to came when u have tested the compilation and endorse, dont worry that will not kill you :o. Thanks for concideration.
author: Didiking35
